oval-def:notes.oval-def:note: Multiple RPMs were updated in this release, but all but mozilla-nspr have mozilla-with-their-same-version as an installation dependency. So, if mozilla is up to date, mozilla-chat, mozilla-devel, ... , mozilla-js-debugger are all up to date. Mozilla itself requires that mozilla-nspr and mozilla-nss be installed with the same version as itself. This closes the loop -- if mozilla is up to date, so are the other mozilla-FOO RPMs.
